Open Tools, Interfaces and Metrics for Implementation Security Testing

OPTIMIST Hour

File Format for Traces
File Format Index

OPTIMIST Workshop @CHES24

Optimist OSE Discourse

File Format for Traces

We address standard APIs and interoperability issues for trace data formats of side-channel data and other real-time measurements of implementation security. We will host several invited speakers and have a discussion session. Our objective for this hour is to gather the community input and interest in the definition of a common API for Trace Data Formats.

Current version: [File Format for Traces v0.5 (1/6/2025)]

Web Resource (Discourse)

We recommend joining the Optimist OSE Discourse to keep up to date with the Optimist OSE. Here we will post announcements as well as additional materials like indexes of open source projects that we believe will be helpfull to the community.
